      • isForegroundPixel

        public boolean isForegroundPixel(java.awt.Point p)
        checks for foreground pixels
        Parameters:
        p - pixel (as Point)
        Returns:
        true, if pixel has foreground color; false, in case the pixel does not exist (out of bounds) or has background color.
